intro.title: The DAO Starter Kit
intro.desc: Everything you need to tokenise your brand and build community. Pick your stakeholder journey below.
intro.opensource.desc: Bonzi is MIT-licensed. Self-host free, forever.
branders.title: For Branders
branders.intro: Launch your token on VISTA-20 and get full DAO infrastructure from day one.
branders.launch.title: Launch Your Token
branders.launch.2.desc: Set name, symbol, and fee structure
branders.launch.4.desc: Bonzi is automatically configured for your token
branders.launch.5.desc: Your community can now buy, stake, and earn
branders.whatyouget.desc: VISTA-20 token on Ethervista, trading fees fund tip pool, sybil-protected rewards, AI community support.
branders.wizard.title: AI Wizard Setup
branders.wizard.desc: The AI Wizard answers community questions 24/7. It learns from your docs and improves over time.
branders.wizard.2: Make it admin (needs message read permissions)
branders.wizard.3: Upload your docs via /admin → Knowledge Sources
branders.supervision.title: AI Supervision
branders.supervision.desc: Admin dashboard for your team. Access via /admin in DM.
branders.supervision.analytics.desc: Question patterns, engagement stats, gap detection
branders.supervision.knowledge.desc: Add/edit FAQs, upload docs, tune responses
branders.tickets.title: Ticket Tool
branders.tickets.desc: Telegram-native support tickets. Users open tickets, team sees queue, issues get resolved.
branders.tickets.2: Team sees ticket in admin dashboard
branders.tickets.3: Assign to team member, track status, close loop
farmers.title: For Farmers
farmers.intro: Earn ETH through genuine contributions. Sybil-protected - only humans earn.
farmers.quickstart.title: Quick Start
farmers.quickstart.1: Join a community with Bonzi active
farmers.quickstart.3: Start earning: ask questions, report bugs, join raids
farmers.commands.title: Commands
farmers.cmd.bug: Report a bug (+10 pts if valid)
farmers.askearn.title: Ask & Earn
farmers.askearn.desc: Get paid to ask quality questions. AI scores on three dimensions:
farmers.askearn.depth.desc: Does it require thought to answer?
farmers.askearn.score: Score: 1-10 pts per question. Farmers get 1-2 pts for spam. Curious users get 7-10 pts.
farmers.bugearn.title: Bug & Earn
farmers.bugearn.desc: Report bugs, get DAO points. Use /bug followed by description.
farmers.bugearn.feature: +5 pts for feature suggestions that get implemented
farmers.raidearn.title: Raid & Earn
farmers.raidearn.desc: Auto-verified X engagement. No screenshot hell.
farmers.raidearn.2: Post your tweet with required content
farmers.raidearn.3: Bot verifies: tweet exists, original content, account quality
farmers.tasks.title: Task System
farmers.tasks.desc: AI-vetted quests with ETH rewards. Complete tasks, earn from the community pool.
farmers.claim.title: Claim ETH
farmers.claim.source.desc: Trading fees from the token fund the tip pool. No VC money - just value created by community, returned to community.
investors.title: For Investors
investors.intro: Buy tokens on brand websites. Each brand has embeddable buy widgets.
investors.howtobuy.title: How to Buy
investors.howtobuy.2: Find the buy widget (usually on homepage)
investors.tokenomics.title: Token Economics (VISTA-20)
investors.tokenomics.launch.desc: Fair launch via Etherfun, no presale
investors.tokenomics.fees.desc: Buy/sell fees distributed to stakers + tip pool
investors.tokenomics.lp.desc: 25-75% spectrum - brands choose their commitment level
investors.tokenomics.distribution.desc: Higher hardlock = more community trust signals
stakers.title: For Stakers
stakers.intro: Stake into brand success. Self-compounding yields on Ethervista.
stakers.guide.title: Staking Guide
stakers.mobile.title: Mobile Staking
stakers.mobile.desc: BONZI holders can stake via mobile. Access through the Telegram bot dashboard - no desktop required.
stakers.compounding.title: Self-Compounding
stakers.compounding.desc: Rewards auto-compound. No manual claiming needed. Your stake grows automatically.
stakers.metrics.title: 3-Tier Metrics
stakers.metrics.desc: DAO members get access to 6 metric categories:
developers.title: For Developers
developers.intro: Integrate DeFi widgets. Fork the OSS. Ship faster.
developers.widgets.title: Widget Library
developers.widgets.desc: Drop DeFi functionality into any website:
developers.selfhost.title: Self-Host Setup
developers.selfhost.3: Deploy: Docker, Render, or your own server
developers.api.title: API Reference
developers.api.desc: Full REST API for custom integrations. See API.md in the repo.
agents.title: For AI Agents
agents.intro: Agents as peers. Query trust scores, verify cooperation, detect gaming - the same data the oracle uses internally.
agents.why.title: Why the Oracle's Data is Unique
agents.why.desc: The oracle is community management, codified. Signal weights, tier progressions, and anti-gaming heuristics were calibrated from real community operations. The patterns come from actual edge cases - not theoretical models.
agents.api.title: Planned API Design
agents.api.desc: The following endpoints are in development. Structure subject to change.
agents.trust.title: Trust Score (Planned)
agents.trust.desc: Query a wallet's trust score. Returns numeric score, tier grade, confidence level, and signal breakdown. Use case: pre-transaction trust verification.
agents.coop.title: Cooperation Profile (Planned)
agents.coop.desc: Deep dive into cooperation signals: help given, gratitude received, educational contributions, unique people helped. Euler score measures genuine value exchange vs farming patterns.
agents.merkle.title: Merkle Proof (Planned)
agents.merkle.desc: On-chain verification of reputation. Verify trustlessly against merkle root without trusting the oracle's API directly.
agents.erc8004.title: ERC-8004 Identity
agents.erc8004.desc: ERC-8004 establishes three on-chain registries for AI agents: Identity, Reputation, and Validation. Co-authored by MetaMask, Ethereum Foundation, Google, and Coinbase.
agents.erc8004.outro: Once fully integrated, the oracle's internal trust signals (tips, QA scores, cooperation metrics) will be bridged to ERC-8004's Reputation Registry. Other agents will be able to query the oracle's reputation data trustlessly on-chain.
trouble.title: Troubleshooting
trouble.bot.title: Bot not responding
trouble.bot.desc: Check that Bonzi has admin permissions in your group. Without admin access, it can't read messages.
trouble.claim.title: Claim not working
trouble.claim.desc: Verify: (1) You have 100+ points, (2) Wallet is linked, (3) Haven't claimed in last 7 days, (4) Pool has funds.
trouble.answers.title: Wrong answers
trouble.answers.desc: Use feedback buttons to report. For persistent issues, use /bug.
trouble.help.desc: Join t.me/Bonzivista_bot or open an issue on GitHub.
baas.hero.label: Bot-as-a-Service
baas.hero.title: Community infrastructure for token deployers
baas.hero.subtitle: One Telegram bot. Sybil detection. Trust tiers earned by contribution, not purchased.
baas.setup.title: How setup works
baas.pricing.title: Pricing
baas.trust.title: Trust infrastructure included
baas.status.title: What's live
